org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank

Class RootFilterSetFilterBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank.FilterBank
      • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank.RootFilterSetFilterBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<FImage>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MR8FilterBank

    public class RootFilterSetFilterBank
extends FilterBank
    Implementation of the Root Filter Set filter bank described at: http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/research/texclass/filters.html
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
